text: @BarackObama This tweet just exploits the effort and sacrifice of our fallen military heroes, as @BarackObama attempts to pervert Memorial Day reverence focused on the fight for freedom, and divert it into an attack on @realDonaldTrump in the Democrats’ coronavirus exploiting war on America.
